30 /// Performs automatic acquisition and release of a synchronization object.
31 template<class Acquirable> class Guard
32 {
33 public:
34  /// Acquires the given synchronization object upon initialization.
35  Guard(Acquirable & acquirable)
36  : acquirable_(acquirable)
37  {
38  acquirable_.acquire();
39  }
40 
41  /// Releases the synchronization object upon destruction.
42  ~Guard() {
43  acquirable_.release();
44  }
45 
46 private:
47  Acquirable & acquirable_;
48 
49  Guard(const Guard &);
50  Guard & operator = (const Guard &);
51 };
52 
53 // Aliases for guards for known synchronization objects.
54 
55 typedef Guard<Mutex> MutexGuard;
56 typedef Guard<Semaphore> SemaphoreGuard;
57 }
58 }
59 }
